timeline.message:
Improvements to handling of cluster removal

- Don't change health status to "initializing" when creating a new VipStatus,
  as 'initializing' now requires all clusters to be up to transition to 'up',
  which means that if we're already up but are missing a cluster we'll go from
  'up' to 'initializing' and stay there.
- Forget up/down status for removed clusters.
- Nicer logging on ignorable reconfiguration errors.
